item.title: 🐘 dalehurley/php-mcp-sdk (24 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: dalehurley

📝 Repository: dalehurley/php-mcp-sdk

📄 Descrizione: PHP implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling seamless integration between LLM applications and external data sources and tools. ✨ Features 🚀 Complete MCP Protocol Support - Full implementation of the MCP specification 🔧 Type-Safe - Leverages PHP 8.1+ type system with enums, union types, and strict typing ⚡ Async First

⭐ Stelle: 24

🍴 Forks: 1

💻 Linguaggio: PHP
